participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and passionate about the arts. Emma enjoys exploring new recipes and loves the thrill of live performances.
participant_1.background: I am unmarried and I enjoy my freedom. I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters. I am a great cook. I am in a local theater company. I try to find new ways to eat cheese in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and determined, Sarah has a love for music and cooking. She's focused on her health and enjoys being outdoors.
participant_2.background: I sometimes play the drums for hours on end, which is not very productive. I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again. I am a healthy person who enjoys cooking and keeping my hair natural. My favorite singer is Justin Timberlake. My father was an author.

content.text: Nice to meet you, Sarah! I'm participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play the drums, and I also enjoy cooking and keeping my hair natural.
That's great! I'm also a musician, I play the guitar. I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it!
Well, I'm sure you're better than you think! And it's always fun to try new things, right?
Yeah, I agree! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love how it's so easy to make, but it always tastes so good.
Me too! It's the perfect comfort food.
Oh, that's nice! Do you guys get along well?
That's great! I have two older sisters, and we're all pretty close too.
That's awesome! I love having siblings.
